events.name: Electric Vehicle (EV) Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The EV battery supply chain, including extraction, refining, manufacturing, and recycling of raw materials such as lithium and cobalt.
events.description: The EV battery supply chain, including extraction, refining, manufacturing, and recycling of raw materials such as lithium and cobalt.

events.name: Lithium Demand Increase
events.wd_description: The demand for lithium increases significantly due to the growing adoption of electric vehicles (EVs) and the need for EV batteries with higher energy densities.
events.description: The demand for lithium increases significantly due to the growing adoption of electric vehicles (EVs) and the need for EV batteries with higher energy densities.

events.name: Cobalt Demand Increase
events.wd_description: The demand for cobalt increases moderately due to the growing adoption of electric vehicles (EVs) and the need for EV batteries with higher energy densities.
events.description: The demand for cobalt increases moderately due to the growing adoption of electric vehicles (EVs) and the need for EV batteries with higher energy densities.

events.name: Mining and Refining Companies' Response
events.wd_description: Mining and refining companies respond to the increased demand for lithium and cobalt by increasing production and investing in new technologies.
events.description: Mining and refining companies respond to the increased demand for lithium and cobalt by increasing production and investing in new technologies.

events.name: Recycling Technologies Development
events.wd_description: New recycling technologies are developed to extract valuable materials from spent batteries, reducing the environmental impact of the supply chain.
events.description: New recycling technologies are developed to extract valuable materials from spent batteries, reducing the environmental impact of the supply chain.
